languages.text: "Губернатор Медина, именем Лекс Империалис я, проктор Соломон Антар, беру вас под арест по делу о похищении десятины. Ввиду чрезвычайного положения на планете вы сохраните за собой полномочия, но будете действовать под моим надзором. С этого момента вы окажете полное содействие Адептус Арбитес — в частности предоставите мне командование ударными группами и другими ресурсами".

"Governor Medineh, in the name of the Lex Imperialis, I, Proctor Solomorne Anthar, arrest you on suspicion of involvement in the theft of the shipment of the Imperial Tithe. Taking into account the state of emergency on this planet, I will permit you to retain your authority under my direct supervision. From this time forth, you will give the Adeptus Arbites your full cooperation — in particular, by transferring command of the strike groups and other resources to me."
languages.original_text: "Губернатор Медина, именем Лекс Империалис я, проктор Соломон Антар, арестовываю вас по делу о похищении десятины. Ввиду чрезвычайного положения на планете вы сохраните за собой полномочия, но будете действовать под моим надзором. С этого момента вы окажете полное содействие Адептус Арбитес — в частности предоставите мне командование ударными группами и другими ресурсами".

From this time forth, you will give the Adeptus Arbites your full cooperation, in particular, by transferring command of the strike groups and other resource to me."

languages.text: "Gouverneur Medineh, im Namen des Lex Imperia verhafte ich, Proktor Solomorne Anthar, Euch aufgrund Eurer mutmaßlichen Beteiligung am Diebstahl einer Lieferung des imperialen Zehnts. Angesichts des Notstandes auf diesem Planeten gestatte ich Euch die Fortsetzung der Regierungsgeschäfte unter meiner direkten Aufsicht. Ab sofort werdet Ihr vollumfänglich mit dem Adeptus Arbites kooperieren ... insbesondere durch die Abtretung des Kommandos über die Kampftruppen und andere Ressourcen an meine Person."
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh, in the name of the Lex Imperialis, I, Proctor Solomorne Anthar, arrest you on suspicion of involvement in the theft of the shipment of the Imperial Tithe. Taking into account the state of emergency on this planet, I will permit you to retain your authority under my direct supervision. From this time forth, you will give the Adeptus Arbites your full cooperation — in particular, by transferring command of the strike groups and other resources to me."

traits.locale_text: "Gouverneur Medineh, im Namen des Lex Imperia verhafte ich, Proktor Solomorne Anthar, Euch aufgrund Eurer mutmaßlichen Beteiligung am Diebstahl einer Lieferung des imperialen Zehnts. Angesichts des Notstandes auf diesem Planeten gestatte ich Euch die Fortsetzung der Regierungsgeschäfte unter meiner direkten Aufsicht. Ab sofort werdet Ihr vollumfänglich mit dem Adeptus Arbites kooperieren ... insbesondere durch die Abtretung des Kommandos über die Kampftruppen und andere Ressourcen an meine Person."

languages.text: « Gouverneur Medineh, au nom de la Lex Imperialis, je vous arrête pour suspicion de complicité dans le vol de la dîme impériale. Considérant l'état d'urgence qui règne sur cette planète, je vous autorise à conserver votre autorité sous ma supervision directe. J'attends de vous une pleine et immédiate collaboration avec l'Adeptus Arbites, notamment en me transférant le commandement des groupes d'assauts et autres ressources. »
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh, in the name of the Lex Imperialis, I, Proctor Solomorne Anthar, arrest you on suspicion of involvement in the theft of the shipment of the Imperial Tithe. Taking into account the state of emergency on this planet, I will permit you to retain your authority under my direct supervision. From this time forth, you will give the Adeptus Arbites your full cooperation — in particular, by transferring command of the strike groups and other resources to me."

traits.locale_text: « Gouverneur Medineh, au nom de la Lex Imperialis, je vous arrête pour suspicion de complicité dans le vol de la dîme impériale. Considérant l'état d'urgence qui règne sur cette planète, je vous autorise à conserver votre autorité sous ma supervision directe. J'attends de vous une pleine et immédiate collaboration avec l'Adeptus Arbites, notamment en me transférant le commandement des groupes d'assauts et autres ressources. »

languages.text: «Gobernador Medineh, en nombre de la Lex Imperialis, yo, el Procurador Solomorne Anthar, le arresto bajo sospecha de haber participado en el robo del diezmo imperial. Habida cuenta del estado de emergencia en que se halla su planeta, le permitiré conservar su autoridad bajo mi supervisión directa. De ahora en adelante colaborará al máximo con el Adeptus Arbites, concretamente cediéndome el mando de sus tropas de choque y los demás recursos a su disposición».
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh, in the name of the Lex Imperialis, I, Proctor Solomorne Anthar, arrest you on suspicion of involvement in the theft of the shipment of the Imperial Tithe. Taking into account the state of emergency on this planet, I will permit you to retain your authority under my direct supervision. From this time forth, you will give the Adeptus Arbites your full cooperation — in particular, by transferring command of the strike groups and other resources to me."

traits.locale_text: «Gobernador Medineh, en nombre de la Lex Imperialis, yo, el Procurador Solomorne Anthar, le arresto bajo sospecha de haber participado en el robo del diezmo imperial. Habida cuenta del estado de emergencia en que se halla su planeta, le permitiré conservar su autoridad bajo mi supervisión directa. De ahora en adelante colaborará al máximo con el Adeptus Arbites, concretamente cediéndome el mando de sus tropas de choque y los demás recursos a su disposición».

languages.text: “梅迪涅总督，我，索罗蒙·安萨监察官，以帝国法典的名义，在此以涉嫌参与盗窃帝国什一税的罪名逮捕你。考虑到这颗行星当下的紧急状况，我允许你在我的直接监督之下，继续行使你的权力。从现在开始，你必须与帝国法务部通力合作，尤其需要将所有突击部队与其他资源的指挥权移交给我。”
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh, in the name of the Lex Imperialis, I, Proctor Solomorne Anthar, arrest you on suspicion of involvement in the theft of the shipment of the Imperial Tithe. Taking into account the state of emergency on this planet, I will permit you to retain your authority under my direct supervision. From this time forth, you will give the Adeptus Arbites your full cooperation — in particular, by transferring command of the strike groups and other resources to me."

traits.locale_text: “梅迪涅总督，我，索罗蒙·安萨监察官，以帝国法典的名义，在此以涉嫌参与盗窃帝国什一税的罪名逮捕你。考虑到这颗行星当下的紧急状况，我允许你在我的直接监督之下，继续行使你的权力。从现在开始，你必须与帝国法务部通力合作，尤其需要将所有突击部队与其他资源的指挥权移交给我。”

languages.text: 「メディネ総督。レックス・インペリアの名のもとに、私、代理人ソロモーン・アンサールは、帝国租税の輸送物の窃盗に関与した容疑で、あなたを逮捕します。この惑星の非常事態を考慮し、あなたの権限を私の直接監督のもとで維持することを許可します。以後、高等裁定局の全面協力を命じます。特に、打撃部隊および関連資源の指揮権は、私に委譲してもらいます」
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh, in the name of the Lex Imperialis, I, Proctor Solomorne Anthar, arrest you on suspicion of involvement in the theft of the shipment of the Imperial Tithe. Taking into account the state of emergency on this planet, I will permit you to retain your authority under my direct supervision. From this time forth, you will give the Adeptus Arbites your full cooperation — in particular, by transferring command of the strike groups and other resources to me."

traits.locale_text: 「メディネ総督。レックス・インペリアの名のもとに、私、代理人ソロモーン・アンサールは、帝国租税の輸送物の窃盗に関与した容疑で、あなたを逮捕します。この惑星の非常事態を考慮し、あなたの権限を私の直接監督のもとで維持することを許可します。以後、高等裁定局の全面協力を命じます。特に、打撃部隊および関連資源の指揮権は、私に委譲してもらいます」

languages.text: "Vali Medineh, ben Üsteğmen Solomorne Anthar. İmparatorluk Aşarı sevkiyatının çalınması olayına dâhil olmanız şüphesiyle Lex İmperialis adına sizi tutukluyorum. Bu gezegendeki acil durumu göz önünde bulundurarak şahsımın doğrudan denetimi altında otoritenizi sürdürmenize müsaade ediyorum. Şu andan itibaren özellikle de saldırı gruplarının ve diğer kaynakların idaresini bizzat bana devrederek Adeptus Arbites ile her bakımdan iş birliği içerisinde olacaksınız."
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh, in the name of the Lex Imperialis, I, Proctor Solomorne Anthar, arrest you on suspicion of involvement in the theft of the shipment of the Imperial Tithe. Taking into account the state of emergency on this planet, I will permit you to retain your authority under my direct supervision. From this time forth, you will give the Adeptus Arbites your full cooperation — in particular, by transferring command of the strike groups and other resources to me."

Bu gezegendeki acil durumu göz önünde bulundurarak şahsımın doğrudan denetimi altında otoritenizi sürdürmenize müsaade ediyorum. Şu andan itibaren özellikle de saldırı gruplarının ve diğer kaynakların idaresini bizzat bana devrederek Adeptus Arbites ile her bakımdan iş birliği içerisinde olacaksınız."
